description: A man who admitted meeting friends at a football club when he should have been isolating is jailed.
title: Coronavirus: Man who socialised with friends at football club jailed
title_page: Coronavirus: Man who socialised with friends at football club jailed - BBC News
maintext: Wood told police he had been self-isolating since his return and had only left his home because he knew officers were coming to arrest him, so was waiting outside because he did not want them to disturb his mother.
